activity_tracker_instance_name.name: activity_tracker_instance_name
activity_tracker_instance_name.description: The name of the Activity Tracker instance to create. Defaults to 'activity-tracker-<region>'

activity_tracker_manager_key_name.name: activity_tracker_manager_key_name
activity_tracker_manager_key_name.description: The name to give the Activity Tracker manager key.

activity_tracker_plan.name: activity_tracker_plan
activity_tracker_plan.description: The Activity Tracker plan to provision. Available: lite, 7-day, 14-day, 30-day, hipaa-30-day

activity_tracker_service_endpoints.name: activity_tracker_service_endpoints
activity_tracker_service_endpoints.description: The type of the service endpoint that will be set for the activity tracker instance.

activity_tracker_tags.name: activity_tracker_tags
activity_tracker_tags.description: Tags associated with the Activity Tracker instance (Optional, array of strings).

at_cos_bucket_endpoint.name: at_cos_bucket_endpoint
at_cos_bucket_endpoint.description: An endpoint for the COS bucket for the Activity Tracker archive. Pass either the public or private endpoint (Only required when var.enable_archive and var.activity_tracker_provision are true)

at_cos_bucket_name.name: at_cos_bucket_name
at_cos_bucket_name.description: The name of an existing COS bucket to be used for the Activity Tracker archive (Only required when var.enable_archive and var.activity_tracker_provision are true).

at_cos_instance_id.name: at_cos_instance_id
at_cos_instance_id.description: The ID of the cloud object storage instance containing the Activity Tracker archive bucket (Only required when var.enable_archive and var.activity_tracker_provision are true).

enable_archive.name: enable_archive
enable_archive.description: Enable archive on logDNA and Activity Tracker instances

enable_platform_logs.name: enable_platform_logs
enable_platform_logs.description: Receive platform logs in the provisioned IBM Cloud Logging instance.

enable_platform_metrics.name: enable_platform_metrics
enable_platform_metrics.description: Receive platform metrics in the provisioned IBM Cloud Monitoring instance.

ibmcloud_api_key.name: ibmcloud_api_key
ibmcloud_api_key.description: Only required to archive. The IBM Cloud API Key.

logdna_cos_bucket_endpoint.name: logdna_cos_bucket_endpoint
logdna_cos_bucket_endpoint.description: An endpoint for the COS bucket for the LogDNA archive. Pass either the public or private endpoint. (Only required when var.enable_archive and var.logdna_provision are true).

logdna_cos_bucket_name.name: logdna_cos_bucket_name
logdna_cos_bucket_name.description: The name of an existing COS bucket to be used for the LogDNA archive. (Only required when var.enable_archive and var.logdna_provision are true).

logdna_cos_instance_id.name: logdna_cos_instance_id
logdna_cos_instance_id.description: The ID of the cloud object storage instance containing the LogDNA archive bucket. (Only required when var.enable_archive and var.logdna_provision are true).

logdna_instance_name.name: logdna_instance_name
logdna_instance_name.description: The name of the IBM Cloud Logging instance to create. Defaults to 'logdna-<region>'

logdna_manager_key_name.name: logdna_manager_key_name
logdna_manager_key_name.description: The name to give the IBM Cloud Logging manager key.

logdna_plan.name: logdna_plan
logdna_plan.description: The IBM Cloud Logging plan to provision. Available: lite, 7-day, 14-day, 30-day, hipaa-30-day

logdna_provision.name: logdna_provision
logdna_provision.description: Provision an IBM Cloud Logging instance?

logdna_service_endpoints.name: logdna_service_endpoints
logdna_service_endpoints.description: The type of the service endpoint that will be set for the LogDNA instance.

logdna_tags.name: logdna_tags
logdna_tags.description: Tags associated with the IBM Cloud Logging instance (Optional, array of strings).

region.name: region
region.description: The IBM Cloud region where instances will be created.

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The id of the IBM Cloud resource group where the instance(s) will be created.

sysdig_instance_name.name: sysdig_instance_name
sysdig_instance_name.description: The name of the IBM Cloud Monitoring instance to create. Defaults to 'sysdig-<region>'

sysdig_manager_key_name.name: sysdig_manager_key_name
sysdig_manager_key_name.description: The name to give the IBM Cloud Monitoring manager key.

sysdig_plan.name: sysdig_plan
sysdig_plan.description: The IBM Cloud Monitoring plan to provision. Available: lite, graduated-tier, graduated-tier-sysdig-secure-plus-monitor

sysdig_service_endpoints.name: sysdig_service_endpoints
sysdig_service_endpoints.description: The type of the service endpoint that will be set for the Sisdig instance.

sysdig_tags.name: sysdig_tags
sysdig_tags.description: Tags associated with the IBM Cloud Monitoring instance (Optional, array of strings).

activity_tracker_crn.name: activity_tracker_crn
activity_tracker_crn.description: The id of the provisioned Activity Tracker instance.

activity_tracker_guid.name: activity_tracker_guid
activity_tracker_guid.description: The guid of the provisioned Activity Tracker instance.

activity_tracker_manager_key_name.name: activity_tracker_manager_key_name
activity_tracker_manager_key_name.description: The Activity Tracker manager key name

activity_tracker_name.name: activity_tracker_name
activity_tracker_name.description: The name of the provisioned Activity Tracker instance.

activity_tracker_resource_group_id.name: activity_tracker_resource_group_id
activity_tracker_resource_group_id.description: The resource group where Activity Tracker instance resides

activity_tracker_resource_key.name: activity_tracker_resource_key
activity_tracker_resource_key.description: The resource/service key for agents to use

logdna_crn.name: logdna_crn
logdna_crn.description: The id of the provisioned LogDNA instance.

logdna_guid.name: logdna_guid
logdna_guid.description: The guid of the provisioned LogDNA instance.

logdna_ingestion_key.name: logdna_ingestion_key
logdna_ingestion_key.description: LogDNA ingest key for agents to use

logdna_name.name: logdna_name
logdna_name.description: The name of the provisioned LogDNA instance.

logdna_resource_group_id.name: logdna_resource_group_id
logdna_resource_group_id.description: The resource group where LogDNA instance resides

logdna_resource_key.name: logdna_resource_key
logdna_resource_key.description: LogDNA service key for agents to use

region.name: region
region.description: The IBM Cloud region where instances will be created.

sysdig_access_key.name: sysdig_access_key
sysdig_access_key.description: Sysdig access key for agents to use

sysdig_crn.name: sysdig_crn
sysdig_crn.description: The id of the provisioned Sysdig instance.

sysdig_guid.name: sysdig_guid
sysdig_guid.description: The guid of the provisioned Sysdig instance.

sysdig_name.name: sysdig_name
sysdig_name.description: The name of the provisioned Sysdig instance.

sysdig_resource_group_id.name: sysdig_resource_group_id
sysdig_resource_group_id.description: The resource group where Sysdig monitor instance resides
